title: "Real Estate-Focused Fintech UpEquity Turns to Blend to Power Simpler Mortgage Process for Consumers"
excerpt: "Blend (NYSE: BLND), a leader in cloud banking software, today announced a new fintech customer UpEquity, an Austin-based digital mortgage company assisting customers in making cash offers. UpEquity will use Blend’s platform to help power seamless digital mortgage experiences as part of a broader effort to simplify the process of buying a home."
